alert.note: Alert for Griggs; Nelson; Ramsey (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 4:36PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nelson, north central Griggs and southeastern Ramsey Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 436 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pekin, or 37 miles southeast of Devils Lake, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... McVille, Tolna, Red Willow Lake, Pekin, Kloten and Michigan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
